#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#define REP(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)

int main(){
  int i,j,k,l,m,n,len;
  int size,count=0;
  char in[200];
  int dp[23];
  char *w="welcome to conscientia";

  scanf("%d\n",&size);
  while(size--){
    gets(in);
    len=strlen(in);
    rep(i,23) dp[i]=0; dp[0]=1;

    rep(i,len)
    for(k=21;k>=0;k--)
    if(w[k]==in[i])
    dp[k+1]=(dp[k+1]+dp[k]);

    printf("%d\n",dp[22]);
  }

  return 0;
}
